body:
@mingfeima Thanks for the information!
I believe we have recently optimized `norm` in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/5722
About the slowdowns due to double the number of threads than required, I thought that the backward pass of autograd only spawned threads if we were performing operations on GPUs? @colesbury 
But I might be missing something...
